alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hansford; Hartley; Hutchinson; Moore; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 2:20AM CDT until July 14 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hutchinson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Hansford County in the Panhandle of Texas... Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Dallam County in the Panhandle of Texas... Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... Eastern Hartley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 220 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles east of Stratford to 4 miles west of Cactus to near Channing, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dumas, Borger, Spearman, Stratford, Hartley, Cactus, Fritch, Sunray, Stinnett, Gruver, Channing, Sanford, Pringle, Morse, Four Way, Conlen, Masterson and Lake Meredith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Dallam; Hansford; Hartley; Hutchinson; Moore; Sherman
